# description

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the hand pose classifier.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing a hand pose classifier

- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the hand pose classifier suitable for debugging.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the hand pose classifier that’s viewable in a playground.
